name: Cyber Samurai (Siyuan Guo)
description:
"I will kill the enemies before sakura falls on the ground, as I always do."---C

In the game, you will act as a samurai named C in the cyberpunk city. The sakura will fall on the ground in 10 seconds, you need to kill all enemies before that to win the game. 

 

How to control the character:

A-move left

D-move right

Space-jump

Left click-attack

 

This game is made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 51 by Siyuan Guo, REN Ruixuan, Michael, and Chonghan Wang. This is also the first digital game designed by myself.  XD

Good luck and thanks for the support!
